attributes.action: Provide NHS funding for hair systems for females suffering hair loss
attributes.additional_details:
Currently the NHS only provides prescriptions for wigs and hair pieces for females suffering from hair loss.
Hair systems are an alternative to wigs and hair pieces, made from real hair these systems can change lives! However, currently the NHS does not offer any funding for this procedure!
We need to change this and improve the lives of thousands of ladies in the UK!

rejection.details: Neither the Department of Health nor the Government is responsible for prescribing decisions, which are the responsibility of the local NHS.
